Posts.Content: When the breast cancer come to us, we could do nothing.But we could do something before it comes to prevent it. Just read a ton of articles in {link deleted by admin. http://cancerforums.net/viewtopic.php?t=12696 as amended http://cancerforums.net/viewtopic.php?t=7121 } . Hope it could advise me on how to prevent breast cancer. Following is one of the articles I thought it was useful from the site. When it comes to further minimizing the chance of breast cancer recurrence, Dr. Carolyn Kaelin, a Harvard surgeon, breast cancer survivor and author of The Breast Cancer Survivor's Fitness Plan, says, "Brisk walking - about 3.0 mph on a treadmill - for three to five hours per week, or about 30 minutes a day, can net big benefits for breast cancer survivors.
Posts.Title: Walking Can Decrease Breast Cancer Recurrence 40 Percent
